posts.title: Puccini Waffles
posts.intro: These savoury waffles make for a great starter, part of a brunch buffet or even a main course. As an added bonus they look super cute when using a waffle iron instead of a pan to bake them out.

posts.title: `git re-commit`
posts.intro: Re-committing to adjust author/committer meta data - with minimal hassle, that is.

posts.title: You're doin' it wrong, v2
posts.intro: Versioning REST APIs, the endless point of contention. But less terrible in Kotlin, perhaps?

posts.title: `print('Hello World.')`
posts.intro:
So I'll have a go at this blogging thingymabobs that I'm late to by about two decades and pen down my thoughts and ramblings.
You may expect mostly code with a dash of non-content here and there.
